resources.string: No rooms available. Please create a room

1. Keep app running in the background: 
If Keep app running in the background is enabled, a notification will be shown on the notification bar for testing purposes.
The feature allows the app to run in the background for a long time (depending on different brands)

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

The notification permission must be turned on before opening foreground services

By granting the floating window permission, you can also receive notifications for voice or video calls even when the app is running in the background or the screen is locked. \nTo ensure timely notification of incoming voice or video calls, please allow the following permissions: \n1. Allow background activity; 2. Show on lock screen; 3. Allow pop-up windows in the background.
